articles.title: Americans are sick of vaccination amid flu season, COVID boosters: data - New York Post
articles.description: “As a CDC director and a mom and wife and daughter, I wouldn’t recommend something to the American people that I wouldn’t do with my own family.”
articles.content:
An ounce of prevention is worth a pound of complacency.
That’s the message delivered today as the viral disease season begins by Dr. Mandy Cohen, director of the Centers for Disease Control and Prev… [+2665 chars]
